posts.title: How I helped recover ‚Çπ50,000 from a fake bank call
posts.description: Victim received call from 'bank manager' asking for OTP to secure account. Caller ID showed bank's actual number (spoofed).
solution: Immediately blocked all debit/credit cards via mobile banking
Filed complaint on cybercrime.gov.in with call recordings
Contacted bank's 24x7 fraud helpline for transaction freeze
Changed all banking passwords and enabled 2FA
Registered complaint with local cyber crime cell
prevention: Banks NEVER call asking for OTP/CVV/Password
Verify caller by disconnecting and calling bank's official number
Enable transaction alerts for all banking activities
Use virtual cards for online payments
Never share screen during bank calls

posts.title: Instagram account hacked & used for crypto scams - Full recovery in 6 hours
posts.description: Hacker changed email, password, and started DMing followers with fake crypto investment offers. Account recovery completed within 6 hours.
solution: Used Instagram's 'My account was hacked' feature immediately
Submitted government ID proof for identity verification
Asked friends to report account as hacked
Checked 'Apps and Websites' section & removed suspicious access
Enabled two-factor authentication with authenticator app
prevention: Use password manager with unique 16+ character passwords
Enable 2FA with authenticator app (not SMS)
Regularly review active sessions and logged-in devices
Be cautious of 'login via Instagram' on third-party sites
Backup recovery codes in secure location

posts.title: College student facing online harassment - Legal action success story
posts.description: 18-year old student being bullied on WhatsApp groups with morphed images. Perpetrators creating fake profiles to spread rumors.
solution: Documented all evidence (600+ screenshots with timestamps)
Filed police complaint under IT Act Section 66A & 67
Obtained restraining order from local court
Worked with college administration for disciplinary action
Provided counseling and mental health support
prevention: Use WhatsApp privacy settings (last seen, profile photo)
Block and report without engaging with bullies
Save evidence before blocking/removing from groups
Talk to trusted adults/parents immediately
Join online safety workshops in colleges

posts.title: WFH job scam - ‚Çπ25,000 'registration fee' recovered
posts.description: Victim paid registration fee for 'data entry job' promising ‚Çπ35,000/month. Company website was fake with stolen credentials.
solution: Filed complaint on cybercrime portal with payment details
Contacted payment gateway for refund request
Reported fake company website to hosting provider
Shared awareness in job seeker Telegram groups
Traced UPI transaction to temporary account
prevention: Legitimate companies NEVER ask for registration fees
Research company on MCA portal for registration details
Check employee reviews on LinkedIn and Glassdoor
Verify email domain matches company website
Start with video interview before any payment

posts.title: Fake crypto investment platform - ‚Çπ2,00,000 recovered within 72 hours
posts.description: Platform promised 5% daily returns on Bitcoin investments. Website looked professional with fake testimonials and 'SEBI registered' badge.
solution: Traced cryptocurrency wallet addresses using blockchain explorer
Coordinated with Indian crypto exchange for KYC details
Filed detailed FIR with economic offenses wing
Contacted SEBI for fraudulent registration claim
Managed to freeze and recover 85% of funds
prevention: Only invest through SEBI registered platforms
Avoid 'guaranteed returns' promises (red flag)
Research company registration on MCA website
Start with small test amounts before large investments
Use hardware wallets for crypto storage

posts.title: WhatsApp account stolen - Used to ask money from all contacts
posts.description: Hacker took over WhatsApp via SIM swap, sent emergency money requests to all contacts pretending to be victim in hospital.
solution: Immediately informed all contacts via SMS/call about hack
Contacted telecom provider for SIM block & new SIM
Used WhatsApp's 2-step verification recovery option
Checked linked devices and removed all unknown sessions
Educated contacts about such emergency scams
prevention: Never share 6-digit verification code with anyone
Enable two-step verification with PIN in WhatsApp
Set up biometric lock for WhatsApp
Be careful with WhatsApp Web QR codes
Regularly check linked devices in WhatsApp settings

posts.title: Warning: Fake loan apps accessing gallery & blackmailing users
posts.description: Apps offering 'instant loans' then accessing gallery/contacts and threatening to share personal photos if loan not repaid with 50% interest.
solution: Helped uninstall malicious apps and clear data
Reset all Android app permissions from settings
Filed police complaint with app details and screenshots
Reported apps to Google Play Store with evidence
Provided digital cleaning steps for device security
prevention: Only download apps from official Play Store/App Store
Check app reviews and developer information
Review permission requests before installation
Avoid 'instant loan without documents' promises
Use RBI registered NBFC apps only for loans

posts.title: Facebook Marketplace scam - Paid but product never delivered
posts.description: Victim paid via UPI for iPhone on Facebook Marketplace. Seller blocked after payment, profile was fake with stolen photos.
solution: Filed UPI fraud complaint with bank providing UPI ID
Reported fake profile to Facebook with payment proof
Contacted NPCI for transaction dispute
Shared seller details in local buy/sell groups
Helped file police complaint with digital evidence
prevention: Meet in person for Facebook Marketplace transactions
Use COD option for first-time sellers
Check profile age, friends, and previous reviews
Avoid too-good-to-be-true deals
Use Facebook's purchase protection feature

posts.title: Romance scam on dating app - ‚Çπ3,50,000 emotional fraud prevented
posts.description: Scammer built emotional connection over 3 months, then asked for money for 'medical emergency'. Victim was about to transfer funds.
solution: Conducted reverse image search on profile photos
Found same photos on multiple dating platforms
Analyzed chat patterns showing scammer script
Provided emotional support and counseling
Helped secure social media accounts from stalkers
prevention: Never send money to someone you haven't met in person
Do video calls to verify identity
Reverse image search profile pictures
Be cautious of too-perfect profiles
Share dating experiences with trusted friends
